name: KID'O Small Design System - Desktop 1.0
description:
Hello.


KID'O Small Design System is a private one person project. The main purpose of KID'O creation, was to train my skills and force myself to solve encountered problems - in fact, I'm a newbie in UI/UX world.


You can navigate between pages with FLOWs or by clicking menu on the top.


Feel free to leave a comment - I'll appreciate constructive critique, which can help develop my skills.


If you have any questions, don't hesitate to send a private message or use the contact link placed in upper right corner.
